allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix CORS: use same-origin API calls instead of cross-origin

Remove hardcoded www.hihired.org -> hihired.org redirect that was
causing CORS errors. All files now use getAPIBaseURL from api.js
which correctly uses window.location.origin.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove admin restriction on PDF upload - allow all logged-in users

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
